item.description:
Ski Wheelers Columbus Day Weekend Event
Friday 7 pm. Oct 8th. thru Oct 11th.
Ski Wheeler's Ski Club Lodge.
Host: Wayne Potter
Co-Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Carpooling from Nashua, Manchester & Concord NH.
Adults only: 18 and over.
Cost includes Food & Lodge for two nights $83.
& $103 for three nights

Please come and join Steve O.. Meet some of his other friends at the Ski Wheelers Ski Club. We have been invited again to join the Ski Wheeler's Ski Club for their Foliage weekend. This a great opportunity to meet and participate with a new groups of people. The Ski Wheeler's don't just ski. The have and entier weekend of events planned for us. We will be staying at the ski lodge which is much like camping indoors. It is an old classic building clean and well keep. So, you will need to bring your own bedding, soap and towels. The rooms have bunk beds and usually 2 to 4 people per room. All of our food is supplied for the weekend. But you will be making your own breakfast and lunch. They have a large kitchen where everyone sits around and enjoys food, drink and the comaraderie. The Ski Wheelers will make us a great dinner as always.
Host: Wayne Potter wrote:
Greetings Ski Wheeler Friends,

Columbus Day Weekend is a great time to visit the Mt. Washington Valley for the foliage, events and activities the club has planned. Most, if not all of the hotels and motels in the valley are already booked for this time of year. Our club has openings but they are sure to fill fast so mail your completed guest reservation form and check today.

Please fill out the form, and send and make your check out to:
Wayne Potter
3 Angus Ave.
Londonderry, NH. 03053
603-421-0822
wc,potter@comcast.net

Weekend includes:
Fri. night: BYOB Potluck welcoming scoial
Sat., Sun, & Monday: Make your own breakfast & Lunch
Ski Wheelers provide the fixing for breakfast & lunch.
Saturday night dinner at the lodge.

Activities & other Happenings:
Organizer bike ride & hikes
Outlet Shopping ( Sidewalk sales at Setters Green )
Return of the Punkin People ( Jaskson NH. )
Fryeburg Fair
Horseback Trail Rdides
Ghoullog at Mt. Cranmore
Fiddler's Green ( Sat. after dinner )
Oktoberfest 2010 at Attitash

Guest reservation form

Guest Name:
Email:
Phone:

$35.- weekend food + Guest lodging ( $24 - per night )
Total package : $ 83. for two nights
: $107. for three nights
Please check whitch nights you plan tp stay:
( ) Fri & Sat. ( ) Sat. & Sunday ( ) Fri., Sat., Sun.
